1341/8 1923-03-19 # The calendar mistakenly treats 1923 CE as leap, so mistakenly lists this day as 1923-03-18. But it's a Monday, so we know it's 1923-03-19. This is corrected in the next AP year's calendar.

1342/8 1924-03-07
# The Gregorian dates in the calendar are off by one day from the days of the week in the 1303 AP calendar (affecting 1342/9 to 1343/8 AH, inclusive). Using days of the week instead of the Gregorian date for the range.

# Most Gregorian dates in the calendar are off by one day from the days of the week in the 1310 AP calendar (affecting 1349/12 to 1350/10 AH, inclusive). Using days of the week instead of the Gregorian date for the range.
1349/12 1931-04-20
